General.Name: Endor AG
General.Description: Endor AG develops and markets input devices in Germany. The company provides high-end steering wheels and pedals for racing simulations on game consoles and PCs, as well as driving school simulators. It sells its products under the Fanatec brand primarily in Europe, the United States, Canada, Australia, and Japan through e-commerce channel and distribution partners. Endor AG was founded in 1997 and is based in Landshut, Germany.
